mapper.sql: a.creator_id,a.name,a.short_name, s.aid, s.asset_type, s.borrower, s.scale, s.tenor_type, s.tenor, s.repayment_type, s.financing_cost, s.financing_type, s.financing_purpose, s.timing_requirement, s.company_name, s.holder_background, s.capital, s.founded_time, s.major_business, s.total_asset, s.net_asset, s.main_income, s.allowance_income, s.net_profit, s.AL_ratio, s.rating, s.forecast, s.public_debt,s.mature_date, s.bank_line, s.bad_suit, s.law_suit, s.finance_cooporation, s.project_type, s.project_compliance, s.complete_date, s.self_funded, s.repay_arrangement, s.other_financing, s.land_value, s.project_value, s.other_collateral, s.receivable, s.counter_party, s.repay_date, s.pledge_stock, s.pledge_ratio, s.other_pledge, s.guarantor, s.guarantor_background, s.guarantor_rating, s.gov_decision, s.gov_agreement, s.finance_arrangement, s.province,s.city, s.adm_grade, s.GDP, s.main_industry, s.big_three_ratio, s.population, s.gov_total_income, s.general_income, s.transfer_income, s.gov_fund_income, s.gov_debt, s.gov_guarantee, s.liabilities_ratio, s.debt_ration, s.lisence, s.org_inst_code, s.tax_reg, s.le_id, s.bank_card, s.ac_approval, s.article, s.captial_ver, s.credit_report, s.feasibility, s.audit_report, s.finance_statement,s.finance_dvalid,s.financial_dvalid,s.other_file, s.is_guarante,s.guarantor_type
mapper.select:
select
from state_investment_asset s left join assets a on a.id = s.aid where s.aid = #{assetId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into state_investment_asset (id, aid, asset_type, borrower, scale, tenor_type, tenor, repayment_type, financing_cost, financing_type, financing_purpose, timing_requirement, company_name, holder_background, capital, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as founded_time, major_business, total_asset, net_asset, main_income, allowance_income, net_profit, AL_ratio, rating, forecast, public_debt, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as mature_date, bank_line, bad_suit, law_suit, finance_cooporation, project_type, project_compliance, gov_agreement, finance_arrangement, province, city, adm_grade, GDP, main_industry, big_three_ratio, population, gov_total_income, general_income, transfer_income, gov_fund_income, gov_debt, gov_guarantee, liabilities_ratio, debt_ration, lisence, org_inst_code, tax_reg, le_id, bank_card, ac_approval, article, captial_ver, credit_report, feasibility, audit_report,
